languages.text: "Исключено. Друкари никогда не вступили бы в союз с почитателями {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Если нас что-то и сближает с этими ксеносами, так это ненависть к {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-скверне".

"We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."
languages.original_text: "Исключено. Друкари никогда не вступили бы в союз с почитателями {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Если нас что-то и сближает с этими ксеносами, так это ненависть к {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-скверне".

If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

"We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

"We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

languages.text: “这个可能性可以排除，黑暗灵族绝对不会与{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的崇拜者联手。如果说人类和那些异形有什么共同点的话，那就是双方都极其憎恨{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的腐化。”
languages.original_text: "We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

traits.locale_text: “这个可能性可以排除，黑暗灵族绝对不会与{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的崇拜者联手。如果说人类和那些异形有什么共同点的话，那就是双方都极其憎恨{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的腐化。”

languages.text: « Aucune chance. Jamais les Drukharis ne s'allieraient à des fidèles du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. S'il y a bien une chose que l'humanité et ces maudits xénos ont en commun, c'est une haine profonde pour la corruption du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Aucune chance. Jamais les Drukharis ne s'allieraient à des fidèles du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. S'il y a bien une chose que l'humanité et ces maudits xénos ont en commun, c'est une haine profonde pour la corruption du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. »

languages.text: «Esa posibilidad podemos descartarla completamente. Los Drukhari nunca se aliarán con los adoradores del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Si hay una única cosa que la Humanidad y estos xenos tenemos en común es el odio hacia la corrupción de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}».
languages.original_text: "We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

traits.locale_text: «Esa posibilidad podemos descartarla completamente. Los Drukhari nunca se aliarán con los adoradores del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Si hay una única cosa que la Humanidad y estos xenos tenemos en común es el odio hacia la corrupción de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}».

languages.text: 「その可能性はない。デュカーリは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の信者とは決して手を組まない。人類と異種族の共通点を挙げるとすれば、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の腐敗に対する嫌悪感だろう。」
languages.original_text: "We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「その可能性はない。デュカーリは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の信者とは決して手を組まない。人類と異種族の共通点を挙げるとすれば、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}の腐敗に対する嫌悪感だろう。」
「その可能性はない。デュカーリは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の信者とは決して手を組まない。人類と異種族の共通点を挙げるとすれば、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の腐敗に対する嫌悪感だろう。」

languages.text: "Diese Möglichkeit können wir ausschließen. Die Drukhari würden sich niemals mit den Anbetern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} verbünden. Müsste ich eines benennen, was die Menschheit und diese Xenos gemeinsam haben, dann wäre das der Hass auf die Verderbnis des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g}."
languages.original_text: "We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Möglichkeit können wir ausschließen. Die Drukhari würden sich niemals mit den Anbetern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} verbünden. Müsste ich eines benennen, was die Menschheit und diese Xenos gemeinsam haben, dann wäre das der Hass auf die Verderbnis des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g}."

languages.text: "Bu olasılığı gözden çıkarabiliriz. Drukhari katiyen {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'na{/g} tapanlarla ittifak kurmaz. İnsanlık ve zenolar arasında ortak bir şey varsa o da {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} yozlaşmasına karşı nefretleridir."
languages.original_text: "We can rule out that possibility. The Drukhari would never ally themselves with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s worshippers. If I had to name one thing that Humanity and these xenos have in common, it would be a shared loathing for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Bu olasılığı gözden çıkarabiliriz. Drukhari katiyen {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'na tapanlarla ittifak kurmaz. İnsanlık ve zenolar arasında ortak bir şey varsa o da {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} yozlaşmasına karşı nefretleridir."
